sentences.english: I came to know about Yvonne Foong's experience two years ago.

sentences.english: If the two forward combination Shuangjian, Belgium Jieshuo will not be able to escape.

sentences.english: "Bi"is the valuable ritual vessels and another name for jade.

sentences.english: In this way, Gish Jen has created the new situation of Chinese American literature.

sentences.english: The murals in the Yongle Palace total 873 square meters.

sentences.english: One such couple is here with us now.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的一對璧人現在就與我們在一起。

sentences.english: The couple had announced their engagement in May.
sentences.chinese: 這對璧人曾在五月宣佈了訂婚消息。

sentences.english: These droplets trickle down the inner wall into a circular trough at the inner base of the cone.
sentences.chinese: 這些液滴在內璧滴下進入圓錐體底部的圓形槽內。
